abstract: AT&T testified in Congress about high standards needed before it tracks the online behavior of customers. But the company already follows users on its own site.
snippet: AT&T testified in Congress about high standards needed before it tracks the online behavior of customers. But the company already follows users on its own site.
lead_paragraph: Kudos to Wendy Davis at MediaPost for catching AT&T in a case of “Do as I say, not as I do.”

headline.main: AT&T Doesn’t Want to Follow You (Except When It Does)
